about_the_game:
The Corgi Knight is about a corgi who starts out as a simple apple-picker, in a simple corgi town. No one expects much greatness from this little corgi, but when danger strikes, he finds himself in the midst of an epic adventure to save not only his village, but much, much more. He soon finds a friend to help him, the Wizard Cat. Together, they use teamwork to help bring peace once more.

This is a game you won't soon forget, a game that takes you away from reality and into a realm of uncommon peculiarity. In this game, certain tasks will require you play as the  chivalrous Corgi Knight, while other tasks require the clever Wizard Cat. The gameplay is casual with a flare of danger. There will be levels of the game that range from 2.5D sidescroller platforms, to fully 3D immersive levels. You can either use a keyboard or a controller to play. If you are looking for a fun and unique experience, this game is for you.
